headline: SBA Communications Corporation to Speak at Citi’s 30th Annual Global Property CEO Conference
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., February 18, 2025--SBA Communications Corporation (NASDAQ: SBAC) ("SBA") announces that Brendan Cavanagh, President and Chief Executive Officer is scheduled to speak at Citi’s 30th Annual Global Property CEO Conference on Tuesday, March 4, 2025 at 2:55pm ET. The conference will be at The Diplomat Resort & Spa in Hollywood, Florida. The audio presentation for SBA can be accessed by visiting www.sbasite.com.
